Events that occurred on 20 May.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1931 – Actor Michael Spice is born.
1965 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 270.
1969 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 310.
2011 – Unquendor's Lustrumfeest.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
Arwen and Elrond come to Lothlórien on their way to Minas Tirith.
